author: missgiggles

comments.content: That is completely charming! I’m going to pre-order it if I can.
I’ve pre-ordered it. There’s 2 cover options. The one with the cover on the video is better. There’s one with a red cover too but a few pounds cheaper. I’m glad you enjoyed that :)
I am looking forward more typesetting projects in Indesign, Quark, Framemaker, Ms-Word. Also, undertaking pdf conversion projects.
